lexUnit.name: coterie.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a small exclusive group of people with shared interests or tastes

sentence.text: THE debate about how BBC Television covers the arts enters a new phase tonight when BBC2 launches a new show deliberately intended as a rival to The Late Show and its laid-back coterie of cultural commentators .
In the 1920s , after the British literary establishment had neglected him for forty years , Machen attracted a coterie of admirers in the United States .

In Scotland in particular there is a coterie of men and women working on VAT for whom he set an example to be followed .
